Name: countryName
ValidationRules: Country of telco group or federation

Name: organizationName
ValidationRules: Aligns with roaming and interconnect agreements

Name: commonName
ValidationRules: No DNS semantics; describes NF PKI root

Name: basicConstraints
ValidationRules: Marks telco root as CA; limits NF CA depth

Name: keyUsage
ValidationRules: Root used solely to sign sub-CAs and CRLs

Name: nameConstraints
ValidationRules: Constrains subordinate NF certs to specific PLMN/FQDN namespace

Name: ecdsa-with-SHA384
ValidationRules: Current standard in many telco PKIs

Name: id-ecPublicKey
ValidationRules: Curve in line with telecom crypto policy

Name: id-ml-dsa-65
ValidationRules: Issuer=subject; possibly cross-signed by classical root for transition
